* This is a simple list item
* Followed by another


* Followed by

    a para list item
* and a normal one
* and

    a para

para

* multi line
  list item

para

*  list item line1
   one line
   two lines
*  list item line2
   one line
   two lines

para

*   list item line3
    one line
    two lines
*  list item line4
    one line
     two lines

para
